title: index
content: Welcome This is the site for a notsosecret seminar on mathematics organized by a couple of secondyear math CS students at the University of Waterloo We meet every Friday

title: Upcoming Talks
content: MathJaxHubConfig extensions tex2jaxjs jax inputTeX outputHTMLCSS tex2jax inlineMath displayMath processEscapes true HTMLCSS availableFonts TeX Topic Speaker Location Time Talks on Friday October 14 2016 Information Theory Sidhant Saraogi MC 5479 1730 I will try to provide a brief introduction to Information Theory working towards motivating Shannon39s NoisyChannel Coding Theorem Required reading Stirlings Approximation 91PDF93 Types and ObjectOriented Programming Nikita Kapustin MC 5479 1830 I39ll be talking about how to use basic types like sets and functions to construct other types and use them to represent objects Talks on Friday October 21 2016 Category Theory Luthfi Mawarid MC 4020 1730 Quantum Computing Michael Pang MC 4020 1830 Talks on Friday October 28 2016 Convex Optimization Rolina Wu MC 4020 1730 Integration Gregory Patchell MC 4020 1830 Introduce the ideas that lead to the Lebesgue definition of the integral stressing on understanding rather than rigourous details Talks on Friday November 4 2016 Game Theory Koosha Totonchi MC 4020 1730 Symmetric Groups Representation Theory and Young Tableaux Randy Lin MC 4020 1830 Talks on Friday November 11 2016 Graphs Surfaces and Homology Kai Rsch MC 4020 1730 Random Graphs and Complex Networks Freida Rong MC 4020 1830 Talks on Friday November 18 2016 Hypercomplex Numbers Fengyang Wang MC 4020 1730 We all know that 36mathrm123i125261136 But what if it werent This talk explores generalizations of the complex numbers Elliptic Curves and Modular Forms Akshay Tiwary MC 4020 1830 40Preliminary41 Ill talk about these at a rough level and try to explain a tiny bit about how these relate to Fermats Last Theorem Talks on Friday November 25 2016 Quandles The Algebra of Knots Brennen CreightonYoung MC 4020 1730 Nave Lie Theory Aidan Patterson MC 4020 1830 Talks on Friday December 2 2016 Basic Harmonic Analysis Mohamed Ayman MC 4020 1730 Symmetries and Their Role in Physics Vasudev Shyam MC 4020 1830
